name: scenario-03-connection-pooling
description: Scenario 3: Connection Pooling — job queue system

scripts.status: node -e "const {Pool} = require('pg'); const db = new Pool({host:'postgres',user:'postgres',password:'postgres',database:'jobqueue'}); db.query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jobs').then(r => { console.log('✅ Database ready. Jobs in DB:', r.rows[0].count); db.end(); }).catch(() => { console.log('❌ Database not ready yet.'); db.end(); })"
